reviews.review: much shorter than portal 2 and more way more turret levels than portal 2. Easier and shorter than the second. I wouldn't say it's as good as the second, but still a phenomenal game. Should definitely play this one if you're going to play the second. 10/10
Finished the main story very fast, it was short, but great. Music is great, glados is funny and a great character and the half life link inside the game was very well hidden and fun to find

Portal is a classic for a reason. It's a brilliant puzzle game that has operates on the endlessly fun and clever concept of the portal gun. Also, the cynical and dry humor provided by the robotic antagonist GLaDOS is always a treat to hear.

The humor in this game is off the charts. It's quirky, witty, and makes the puzzle solving experience a lot more relaxing and lighthearted.

As for the puzzles themselves, they are indeed quite clever. They're all so entertaining and fun, rewarding yet a bit challenging. This is one of the classics and best games made by Valve, so there's not much more that needs to be said.
I loved this game, its a great starter game and even for anyone who don't like videogames, I can say they will enjoy this :)

After Beating the game, it does feel satisfying to know how a portal gun works and doing these tricks to beat the game. If you feel like doing the campaign and challenges, go for it I 100% recommend this game.

La corta duracion de la campa√±a principal lo hace un juego sumamente recomendable para aquellos que no dispongan de mucho tiempo. Ademas el juego tambien presenta un modo desafio en donde se incluyen desafios contrareloj y 6 niveles de la campa√±a principal modificados con el fin de crear una experiencia mas desafiante para los jugadores que buscan un mayor reto.

wanted to get the full story of portal after playing portal 2. It was good (not as good as portal 2) but for  $3 you can't go wrong. The game holds up pretty well was fun and gives you an appreciation of the quality of valve games.

Wonderful. Funny and reasonably challenging. Probably on the easier side of medium, in hindsight. Glados is a great character.

I only have two real complaints. First, it's too short. Took me about 4 hours to complete. Thankfully, this is remedied in Portal 2. Second, the game starts off sort of slow since you can't put down two portals. You can only put down one and the other is put down for you. Eventually, you get the ability to put down two. 

For the price, I'd say it's worth it.
One of the best and an absolute classic! If you call yourself a gamer, then you MUST play this!!!!
This game is best, but sometimes making me dizzy.

This game is truly one of my favourite games, although it's short and I managed to beat it in around 3 hours. This game is absolutely an amazing game, it's filled jam packed with a story that draws you in and makes you want to learn all of the lore about the world of Aperture labs. 

I managed to complete the main game in around 3 hours, but it felt so short simply from the amount of fun I was having and they have extra challenge chambers.

 The idea of solving physics based puzzles and the mechanics that valve utilises makes the game so interesting and enjoyable to play. I'll admit I was late to playing the game as I purchased it a few days ago. 

If you've been considering playing this game or you haven't already, I highly advise you purchase the portal pack with both games as the portal games are truly amazing and enjoyable, yet challenging
Usually not a fan of puzzle games but this one is fantastic.
